fields.name: CH_ErrorMessageBeforeClose
fields.fieldText: You cannot close this support ticket with outage reported or assessed if following fields are not populated: None Alarmed Outage, Outage Context, Restore Action, Primary Cause, Secondary Cause and Outage Triggered by.

fields.name: CH_ErrorBeforeClose
fields.fieldText: You cannot close this support ticket with outage reported or assessed if following fields are not populated: None Alarmed Outage, Outage Context, Restore Action, Primary Cause, Secondary Cause and Outage Triggered by.

fields.name: CH_Incident_FinalScreen_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Even though the Record Type equals Incident, the Set Issue Resolved Button cannot be used

fields.name: CH_RecordType_InformationRequest_FinalScreen_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Although the Record Type is equal Information Request, there are no status and stage combinations that apply at the moment.

fields.name: CH_RecordType_Problem_FinalScreen_Text
fields.fieldText: This button cannot be used when the Record Type equals Problem.

fields.name: CH_TCANotcheked
fields.fieldText:
TCA Ready must be ticked before closing this Support Ticket.


For Outage Reported or Assessed the following fields must be populated before closure : None Alarmed Outage, Outage Context, Restore Action, Primary Cause, Secondary Cause and Outage Triggered by

fields.name: Default_Outcome_Final_Screen_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: There is no scenario applicable for the Set Issue Resolved Button.

fields.name: Incident_w_Restoration_Final_Screen_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Even though the Record Type equals Incident with Restoration, the Set Issue Resolved Button cannot be used

fields.name: Solution_Provide_Resolve_Final_Screen_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Check guidance for success to verify actions required to go to next stage.

fields.name: Solution_Provided_Resolve_Final_Screen_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Check guidance for success to verify actions required to go to next stage.

fields.name: SolutionProvidedResolve_FinalScreen_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Check guidance for success to verify actions required to go to next stage.

textTemplates.name: CH_ChatterPost_RespondedInProgressResolve
textTemplates.text:
This Case has been resolved on Customer Request after pressing Set Issue Resolved Button.
Solution Provided has been set to {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} Solution Details have been set to "Issue closed on customer request" Case Status has been set to Solution Provided

textTemplates.name: CH_SolutionDetailsText
textTemplates.text: This Case has been closed on Customer Request after pressing Set Issue Resolved Button.

textTemplates.name: ChatterPost_IssueResolved
textTemplates.text: Case values have been updated after pressing the Set Issue Resolved button.

textTemplates.name: Post_RespondedinProgressDiagnosisTechnicalAnalysis
textTemplates.text:
This Case has been resolved on Customer Request after pressing Set Issue Resolved Button.
Solution Provided/Temporary Solution timestamp has been set to {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} Temporary Solution Details and Solution Details have been set to "Issue closed on customer request" Case Status has been set to Solution Provided
